characters.title: Characters

scenes.title: Scene Images
scenes.description: Generate images for each scene of your film
scenes.addCharactersFirst: Please add characters in Step 2 first to generate scenes
scenes.addCharactersForDialogue: Add characters in Step 2 to enable dialogue

videos.title: Videos
videos.description: Convert scene images to animated videos using Grok AI
videos.noImagesDescription: Generate scene images in Step 3 before creating videos
videos.grokStep1: Upload your scene image to Grok AI
videos.grokStep2: Copy the Image-to-Video prompt from the scene
videos.grokStep3: Generate and download the 6-second video clip
videos.tip: For best results, ensure your scene images have consistent characters and clear compositions before video generation.
videos.voiceoverNote: Voiceover audio is not included - add dialogue audio from Step 5 in your video editor (CapCut)

voiceover.title: Voiceover
voiceover.description: Generate voice audio for character dialogues
voiceover.noDialogueDescription: Add dialogue to your scenes in Step 3 to generate voiceovers
voiceover.elevenLabsDescription: High-quality English voices with natural intonation and emotion
voiceover.geminiDescription: Native Slovak voices powered by Google Gemini 2.5 Pro TTS
voiceover.tip: Assign a consistent voice to each character for a professional result. Download all audio files for easy import into CapCut.

export.title: Export & Summary
export.description: Review your project and export all prompts and assets
export.jsonDescription: Full project data for backup or import
export.textDescription: Plain text file with prompts only
export.capcutInstructions: Import your videos and audio files into CapCut. Arrange scenes on the timeline and add transitions.
export.davinciInstructions: Import media into DaVinci Resolve for professional color grading and audio mixing.
export.congratulationsDescription: Your film project is ready for export. Download all prompts and assets to start editing.
export.tip: Keep the JSON export as a backup. You can import it later to continue working on the project.

help.title: Help & Documentation
help.subtitle: Learn how to use Film Generator
help.welcomeDescription: Create professional AI-generated short films in 6 simple steps. From story concept to final export, we guide you through the entire process.
help.apiKeysDescription: To use automatic generation features, you'll need API keys from the following services:
help.contactDescription: Contact us for additional support or feature requests.

steps.storyPromptDesc: Define your story concept, choose a visual style (Disney/Pixar, Realistic, Anime), and generate the master prompt that will guide all content creation.
steps.charactersDesc: Create and customize your film characters. Generate character images using AI or upload your own. Each character gets a visual description for consistency.
steps.sceneImagesDesc: Generate images for each scene using text-to-image prompts. Add dialogue lines and camera shot types. Use Claude AI to auto-generate scene breakdowns.
steps.videosDesc: Convert scene images to 6-second animated videos using Grok Imagine (via Kie.ai). Each video includes ambient audio but no dialogue.
steps.voiceoverDesc: Generate voice audio for character dialogues. Choose between ElevenLabs (English) or Gemini TTS (Slovak). Assign unique voices to each character.
steps.exportDesc: Review your project timeline, export all assets, and download CapCut-ready project files. See credits usage summary.

tips.specificDesc: The more detailed your prompts, the better the results. Include character descriptions, lighting, camera angles, and mood.
tips.consistencyDesc: Use the same character descriptions across all scenes to maintain visual consistency. The master prompt helps with this.
tips.startSmallDesc: Begin with 12 scenes to test your workflow before committing to larger projects (24, 36, or 60 scenes).
tips.reviewDesc: Always review generated prompts before generating images or videos. Small edits can significantly improve results.
tips.exportRegularlyDesc: Export your project as JSON frequently. This serves as a backup and allows you to continue work later.

faqs.apiKeys: What API keys do I need?
faqs.apiKeysAnswer: For full functionality, you need: Google Gemini API key (text, images, Slovak TTS), Kie.ai API key (video generation via Grok Imagine), and optionally ElevenLabs API key (English voiceover). You can use the app without API keys in manual mode by copying prompts.
faqs.creditsAnswer: Each generation costs credits: Images cost 5 credits, Videos cost 20 credits, Voiceover lines cost 2 credits, and Scene generations cost 1 credit. New users start with 500 credits.
faqs.slowMotion: Why are my videos in slow motion?
faqs.slowMotionAnswer: Grok Imagine automatically determines movement speed based on your prompt. Add words like "dynamic motion", "quick movement", or "energetic" to your Image-to-Video prompts for faster motion.
faqs.noDialogue: Why is there no dialogue audio in my videos?
faqs.noDialogueAnswer: Grok Imagine generates ambient audio only, not dialogue. You need to add voiceover audio (from Step 5) to your videos in a video editor like CapCut. This gives you more control over timing.
faqs.ownImages: Can I use my own images?
faqs.ownImagesAnswer: Yes! You can upload your own images for characters or scenes. Click the upload area or drag-and-drop images. The app will still generate prompts for consistency.
faqs.videoFormatsAnswer: Videos are generated as MP4 files at the same resolution as your input images. Duration is fixed at 6 seconds per clip. You can combine clips in CapCut or other editors.
faqs.capcut: How do I import into CapCut?
faqs.capcutAnswer: Export your project from Step 6, then import the videos and audio files into CapCut. Arrange them on the timeline according to the scene order. The export includes a timeline preview to help you organize.
faqs.dataStorageAnswer: By default, all data is stored locally in your browser. API keys never leave your device. You can optionally sign in to enable cloud sync across devices.
faqs.languagesAnswer: The app interface is available in English and Slovak. For voiceovers, ElevenLabs supports English voices, while Gemini TTS supports Slovak voices.
faqs.moreCredits: How do I get more credits?
faqs.moreCreditsAnswer: Credits are currently provided for free during the beta period. In the future, you may be able to purchase additional credits or earn them through referrals.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Last updated: December 2024
terms.acceptanceText: By accessing and using Film Generator ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the Service.
terms.descriptionText: Film Generator is an AI-powered application that helps users create short films through a multi-step workflow including story generation, character creation, scene image generation, video creation, and voiceover generation.
userResponsibilitiesItems: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your API keys
You agree not to use the Service to generate harmful, illegal, or inappropriate content
You are responsible for any content you create using the Service
You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations
terms.thirdPartyText: The Service integrates with third-party AI services including Google Gemini, Kie.ai (Grok Imagine), ElevenLabs, and others. Your use of these services is subject to their respective terms and conditions. We are not responsible for the availability, quality, or policies of third-party services.
terms.intellectualPropertyText: Content you create using the Service belongs to you, subject to the terms of the underlying AI services used. The Film Generator application, its design, and original content are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
terms.creditsSystemText: The Service uses a credits system for tracking usage. Credits are provided for free during the beta period. We reserve the right to modify the credits system, including pricing and allocation, at any time.
terms.dataStorageText: By default, your data is stored locally in your browser. API keys are never transmitted to our servers. If you choose to enable cloud sync, your project data may be stored on our servers subject to our Privacy Policy.
terms.disclaimerText: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND. WE DO NOT GUARANTEE THAT THE SERVICE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, ERROR-FREE, OR THAT AI-GENERATED CONTENT WILL MEET YOUR EXPECTATIONS.
terms.liabilityText: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, WE SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING FROM YOUR USE OF THE SERVICE.
terms.modificationsText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.
terms.terminationText: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to the Service at any time, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users.
terms.contactText: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through the Help section of the application.
terms.agreement: By using Film Generator, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to these Terms of Service.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Last updated: December 2024

highlights.localFirstDesc: Data stored in your browser by default
highlights.noTrackingDesc: We don't track your browsing activity
highlights.yourDataDesc: You control and own your content
highlights.easyDeletionDesc: Delete all data with one click

privacy.introductionText: Film Generator ("we", "our", or "the Service") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our application.
privacy.localStorageText: By default, the following information is stored only in your browser's localStorage:
localStorageItems: API keys you provide for third-party services
privacy.thirdPartyText: When you use AI generation features, your prompts and content are sent directly to third-party services (Google Gemini, Kie.ai, ElevenLabs) using your own API keys. We do not intercept or store this data.
howWeUseItems: To provide and improve the Service
To save your preferences and project state
To facilitate AI content generation through third-party APIs
To track credits usage (stored locally or in our database if signed in)
privacy.localStorageSecurityText: Your data is stored locally in your browser by default. This means:
localStorageSecurityItems: Data never leaves your device unless you use cloud sync
Clearing browser data will delete your projects
We recommend exporting projects regularly as backup
privacy.apiKeySecurityText: API keys are stored only in your browser's localStorage and are sent directly to third-party services when making API calls. We never store, log, or transmit your API keys to our servers.
privacy.thirdPartyServicesText: The Service integrates with the following third-party AI services:
thirdPartyServicesList: Google Gemini - For text generation, image generation, and Slovak TTS
Nano Banana - For high-quality image generation
privacy.thirdPartyServicesNote: Each service has its own privacy policy. When you use these services through Film Generator, your data is subject to their respective privacy policies.
privacy.cookiesText: We use only essential cookies for:
privacy.cookiesNote: We do not use analytics tracking, advertising cookies, or third-party tracking scripts.
yourRightsItems: Access - View all data stored locally in your browser
Export - Download all your projects as JSON files
Delete - Remove all data with the "Delete All Data" button in Settings
Portability - Export and import projects between devices
privacy.childrenText: The Service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
privacy.changesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the Help section of the application.
privacy.privacyByDesignText: Your data stays on your device by default. We believe privacy should be the default, not an option.

settingsPage.subtitle: Manage your account and API keys
settingsPage.apiKeysDescription: Configure API keys to enable direct generation features. Keys are stored locally in your browser.
settingsPage.apiKeysNote: API keys are stored locally in your browser's localStorage. They are never sent to our servers. You can also use the app in manual mode without API keys by copying prompts to external services.
settingsPage.cloudSyncNote: Sign in to enable cloud sync and access your projects from any device.
settingsPage.deleteConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all your projects, settings, and API keys from your browser.

toasts.exportFailedDesc: Failed to export data. Please try again.
toasts.dataDeletedDesc: All your data has been permanently deleted.
